title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       Education Programs Field trips to Wolf Trap and school visits from park rangers enhance classroom learning in a variety of subjects. All programs are free. Click here to download a flyer which describes the education programs. To schedule an education program, for questions about the programs, or if you experience trouble downloading the flyer, please call (703) 255-1827. Click here for information about other programs for kids.
